content: until work measures h inches from ribbing fold piece in half and using kitchener stitch graft top together ribbing starting with rs facing you at the bottom of the face opening pick up and knit one st in each slip_stitch at the edge around the face opening you ll need to end up with a multiple of four so if necessary work a kfb a couple of times spaced out fairly evenly the ribbing will be worked in the round work in 2x2 rib for 5 rounds bind off all sts finishing weave in ends if desired stitch a pompom or tassel to the point of the hood block lightly and done
